sentences.en: A three course dinner completes the culinary delights.
sentences.cn: 做三道菜的一餐就能包含烹饪的所有乐趣。

sentences.en: As many visitors might expect, Qingdao's culinary specialties revolve around seafood.
sentences.cn: 徐:正如很多客人所想的那样, 青岛的烹饪特色以海味为主.

sentences.en: Charlotte would assuage him with some peculiar triumph of her culinary art.
sentences.cn: 夏洛特会用烹饪术的某种独特的“成就”使他平息下去.

sentences.en: Culinary art exhibitions are a world - wide window.
sentences.cn: 烹饪艺术大展是个属于世界的视窗.

sentences.en: Culinary suggestions: Roast lamb . Winged game . Pepper steak.
sentences.cn: 配餐建议: 烤小羊肉,带翅的家禽,或者黑椒小牛扒.

sentences.en: Even white truffles, the prized culinary delicacy , could not escape the slump.
sentences.cn: 即便是食中珍馐松露也难逃贬值的命运.

sentences.en: I am not a black belt in culinary art.
In the afternoon some boxes were to be moved to make room for new culinary supplies.
sentences.cn: 那天下午,要搬掉一些箱子,腾出地方来安放新的厨房用具.

sentences.en: One of the most commonly made culinary foams is whipped cream.
sentences.cn: 最为常见的泡沫状食物是鲜奶油.

sentences.en: Savour the culinary delights of Mexico.
She was keen to acquire more advanced culinary skills.
sentences.cn: 她热切渴望学到更高超的烹饪技巧。

sentences.en: The Fourth of July domestic culinary pyromania is followed by community pyrotechnics.
sentences.cn: 七月四日,人们在家里食完人间烟火,接下去就是社区的烟花会.

sentences.en: The mysterious aura of this specialty promises an exceptional culinary experience.
sentences.cn: 这款咖啡神秘的香味保证给你带来特殊的味觉体验.

sentences.en: You'll be amazed at the culinary creations possible in a Dutch oven.
sentences.cn: 荷兰烤箱能够做的食物之多会让你感到惊奇。

sentences.en: Your resume says that you minored in French culinary arts.
sentences.cn: 你简历上说你有辅修过法式烹饪的课程.

trans.tran_cn: 厨房的，烹饪的，烹调用的
